backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko canister with menu, orders, documents, notifications, access control, and storage logic, including types and basic CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for auditing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptive summaries for key frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and base styles for light and dark themes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads fonts, metadata, PWA settings, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app name, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements caching strategies for static and dynamic assets, handles fetch events, and manages service worker lifecycle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, cart context, and global UI elements for the React app.
frontend/src/components/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with restaurant info, dynamic location, contact details, and operating hours.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with links, cart and notification indicators, user auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompt events and shows a dismissible UI for installing the app.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with a persistent header and footer and renders route content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only form to configure Stripe payment settings and save secret keys and allowed countries.
frontend/src/constants/menuCategories.ts: Defines shared menu category lists for user and admin views.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Exports WhatsApp phone number and base URL for click-to-chat links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, covering menu items, orders, Stripe setup, and user‑specific data. Handles data fetching, mutations, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theming variables for light/dark modes, typography, and custom component classes. Establishes a warm, food‑oriented design palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing orders, menu items, notifications, Stripe config, and restaurant settings. Uses many query hooks and forms for CRUD operations and status updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow using Stripe or WhatsApp, validating identity, building shopping items, and redirecting to Stripe. Displays cart items and handles quantity updates.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page showing location, phone, hours, and WhatsApp actions using fetched restaurant data. Includes interactive buttons for calling and messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards promoting the restaurant. Includes WhatsApp messaging and menu navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Fetches and displays menu items with category filtering, loading states, and add‑to‑cart functionality. Supports image previews and sorted, filtered item listings.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user and broadcast notifications with icons, timestamps, and read-status handling. Supports navigation to order details and requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a sortable list of user orders with statuses and timestamps, handling authentication and loading states. Allows navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTrackingPage.tsx: Displays order tracking details with status indicators, handling loading, auth, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment-cancelled message with options to retry checkout or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe payment confirmation, creates an order, clears the cart, and shows success details.
frontend/src/utils/menuUpdates.ts: Empty placeholder file for future menu update utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links and formatted order messages for sharing cart details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and UI enhancement feature definitions for the redesign effort.
